page.title: 13RECREATION, BARMBY MOOR
page.content: RECREATION. BARMBY MOOR. (Indoor) A flourishing Mum & Toddlers Group. Playgroup run by local residents. Brownies. Guides. Keep-fit, Badminton (2 clubs). Woodcraft-Folk (group), Solo Club, Over 40's Club,2 Darts Teams & Country Women Club. (Outdoor) A Football Team which plays in local country leagues, Cricket Team also in country league. The Village Green is designated a "Play-area." There is also a playing field with the usual play equipment. RELIGION. Barmby Moor Church Activities, Church Choir, Sunday School, Sunday Friends,(for Teenagers) Regular Fellowship meeting. Barmby Moor Chapel Activities, Choir, & Sunday School. The two denominations join together regularly for Worship.
